price: Qor’ani Twayimanuye mu rurimi rw’icarabu, itomoye mu majambo no mu nsiguro vyayo, itagiramwo akanenge; ivyo bikaba biri ukwo, kugira bagamburikire Imana Allah mu kwubahiriza amabwirizwa yayo.
arabic: قُرۡءَانًا عَرَبِيًّا غَيۡرَ ذِي عِوَجٖ لَّعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَّقُونَ

meta.transliteration: qur'ānan ʿarabiyyan ghayra dhī ʿiwajin laʿallahum yattaqūna
